tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HazardousWasteIncidents ( 
  incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  incident_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
  description TEXT, 
  severity VARCHAR(50) 
)

CREATE TABLE Incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    location TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    employee_involved TEXT,
    hazardous_materials_involved TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE Accidents (
    accident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accident_date DATE,
    location TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    severity INT,
    investigation_status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE accidents (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    cause TEXT,
    damage INT
);

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    date TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date TIMESTAMP,
  description TEXT,
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Incidents (
  incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255), 
  date DATE,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Accidents (
  accident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id UUID,
  location VARCHAR(255), 
  date DATE,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE HazardousMaterials (
  material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name VARCHAR(255),
  hazardous_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE Investigators (
  investigator_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(255),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE PreventionMeasures (
  measure_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  description TEXT,
  recommended_action TEXT
)
